text: Ficus andamanica is a species of fig tree in the family Moraceae. The tree is endemic to the Andaman Islands, a territorial part of India located off the Burmese coast. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * andamanica Category:Flora of the Andaman Islands Category:Endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ficus andamanica
